title_advert: ['Best Location and Price! For Direct Buyers!']
location1: ['Al Maryah VistaAbu Dhabi, Al Maryah Island']
descriptions: ['DescriptionAl Maryah Island is a vibrant lifestyle and business destination where you can experience Abu Dhabi at its best. It is home to two world-class five-star hotels, Four Seasons Hotel Abu Dhabi and Rosewood Abu Dhabi and exceptional luxury boutiques. One can find many high-end brand outlets and dining restaurants here.\nThe waterfront pedestrian promenade in Al Maryah Island offers magnificent views of Abu Dhabi. The area is bustling throughout the year because of a variety of exciting events such as New Yearu2019s Eve, Chinese New Year and UAE National Day, all of which are celebrated in The Galleria mall. Comprised of four award-winning towers and the worldu2019s newest financial center, Al Maryah is home to Abu Dhabi Global Market.\nFinance Center and is an international, financial free zone that offers businesses the ideal landscape to invest, grow and thrive. It is home to Abu Dhabi Global Market, the award-winning IFC and governing authority of Al Mariyah Island. Features include retail and dining offerings, premium hospitality and world-class healthcare with.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']

descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties proudly presents this 2-bedroom apartment for sale at Diamond Tiara Residence, Palm Jumeirah. This bright and spacious unit is laid out with quality parquet flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows. It is set on a high floor featuring stunning sea and Atlantis views.

* BUA: 1,677 sq.ft.
* 3 Bathrooms
* High floor
* Unique unit
* 1 Parking space
* Balcony
* Parquet flooring
* Fully fitted semi-closed kitchen
* Panoramic sea and Atlantis views
* Tenanted
Tiara, as its name suggests, is a beachfront resort community centrally located on The Palm's Trunk. A dynamic residential and resort community, Tiara offers private beach access and panoramic views. It provides its' residents with a desirable all-in-one way of living: luxury, convenience, privacy and peace of mind. For those who just want to escape from it all, Tiara is an ideal retreat with an impressive array of amenities and services at hand; for those who want to be among the excitement.
The Palm Jumeirah is one of the most ambitious real-estate developments on earth, named as the 8th wonder of the world as it can be seen from space as a beautiful palm-shaped land. A true resort-style development, it is described as not just a place to be, but rather an experience"]

Ajman One is one of the world-class residential projects in Ajman, it is located in Al Rashidiya 3, which is a border of shrjah and ajman, being close to Sharjah most of the families prefer to live in this project. it’s a five year old building with one of the best finishing in Ajman.  Ajman One has successfully set new trend for contemporary design combined with all the needs of a modern lifestyle.  Ajman One is one-stop destination, offering residential, and shopping and leisure facilities within a single development.
Ajman One is a freehold project located at a prime location on the Ajman Sharjah Border and strategically located near to Ajman Corniche which is a added advantage to this project.  Most of the Europeans loves this project for this reason.
Twelve residential towers form the core of the development.  The towers offer contemporary spaces in a combination of studio, one, two or three bedroom apartment.
The design and layouts are well thought-out and quality of life is of the utmost importance.  Ajman One is a sound investment at a reasonable price, with huge potential for investors or residents.   
Setting new trends for contemporary deisgn, Ajman One combines all the needs of a modern business lifestyle a one –stop destination, offering shopping, leisure, residential, business and hotel facilities within a single development. 
The project consisting residencial amenities such as swimming-pool, Gymnasium, kids play area, garden, covered parking space,  CCTV camera and security staff.  Restaurants, Nesto Hypermarket etc.
